__e: There's no one in this house loves their mother more than I love my mother.
But then, everyone wants someone to love them, even though no-one knows what love is.
As much as I love Lily- which is, you know, more than life itself-
Isn't that right? You will do or say anything, just as long as people love you and think you're perfect!
And I said, "We didn't do anything." And she said, "You could have." And I said, "Well, I might love him."
This child could be my only chance for someone to truly love me, and... you got a second chance. Why can't I?
You know, there's nothing in this world I love as much as you.
This is actually all a blessing because now... I... can go find a man who might possibly love me as much as he loved himself.
Because there's no way that anybody over there, or... or anywhere, loves you as much as I love you right here.
